name: Maryo's Journey
description:
Maryo's village destroyed by a Generic Final Boss and kidnapped their princess.He's kinda self-aware. Will Maryo able to rescue the princess and take down the Final boss? Well, maybe you should help him a little. This game originally  made for #MetaGameJam

Update 1.1 fixes some game breaking bugs.

Controls:

Arrow keys or AD to move

Up arrow key or W to jump

S or Down arrow key to pickup

R to suicide
